entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
